node.title: After months of hints, Matthew McConaughey rules out bid to be next celebrity politician
node.description: After publicly weighing up whether to run for office in America's second-largest state, MatthewÂ McConaughey says he will instead focus on supporting businesses and foundations that create pathways for others to succeed.
node.content:
["Actor Matthew McConaughey has ruled out\u00a0running for Texas governor after months of publicly flirting with the idea of becoming the latest celebrity candidate.", "The Academy Award winner said in a video that political leadership was not a route he was choosing to take \"at this moment.\"", "McConaughey, 52, said he would instead focus on supporting businesses and foundations that create pathways for others to succeed.", "The Texas\u00a0gubernatorial race is already shaping up to be one of the nation's highest profile contests in 2022.", "Republican Governor\u00a0Greg Abbott is seeking a third term and Democrat Beto O'Rourke, coming off failed bids for the US\u00a0Senate and presidency, announced month that he was getting in the race.", "McConaughey\u00a0outpolled Mr Abbott in a speculative head-to-head poll published in the Dallas Morning News in April, with 45 per cent of respondents backing the actor, compared to one-third for the incumbent Mr Abbott.", "The Dazed and Confused\u00a0and Dallas Buyers Club\u00a0star had never said what party \u2014 if any \u2014 he would run under while acknowledging that he was mulling a run for governor in his home state.", "", "
A poll earlier in the year had the Dallas Buyers Club actor ahead of incumbent Greg Abbott.(Supplied: Pinnacle Films)
", "McConaughey had also shied away from going into policy specifics and positions on contentious issues in Texas.", "\"Politicians? The good ones can help us to get to where we need to go, yeah,\" McConaughey said in the video posted to Twitter.", "\"But let's be clear, they can't do anything for us unless we choose to do for ourselves.\"", "In California, former Olympian Caitlyn Jenner ran for governor this year in a failed GOP-led recall effort against Democratic Governor\u00a0Gavin Newsom but gained little momentum.", "AP/ABC"]
